reviews.text: Fantastic maths tuition delivered by Alicia. My daughter has responded well to Alicia's teaching style and finds her both approachable and helpful. In just 6 weeks my daughters confidence has grown and her grades have improved and been noticed by school. Im so glad we have taken the leap to get the extra tuition and have sign up for more classes. At first my daughter was worried about the classes being a n online group but she gets so much private time during the sessions with the tutor when needed its put her at ease and works really well. The cost is worth every penny. Nothing is more important than investing in your child's future!.
